channel.title: my life on Foodieglobetrotter
channel.description: Recent content in my life on Foodieglobetrotter

item.title: New country, new rules
item.description: Switzerland is like heaven, so beautiful you will wish to stay and enjoy every moment. In terms of where we are staying (canton Valais), I cannot begin to describe how happy we are.

item.title: Weekend shenanigans
item.description: We spent Saturday in Killarney catching up with friends from my university. I was never very good with goodbyes despite the time spent apart, I always feel this little bit of sadness.
